name: Periodic Table [Game Boy]
description:
Ever have that moment where you say to yourself "I really need to consult the periodic table of elements" and in the absence of a computer, phone, or practically any device that can connect to the internet, wish you could view it on your Game Boy instead? Me neither, but here it is anyway.

  • Elements with a '+' can be viewed (Press A). 
  • Press START (Enter) to shift viewable elements.
  • Press SELECT (Shift) for title-screen & key.
